00034 
00035   if (argc < 2) {
00036     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] mcstatefin mcstateini"
00037             "\n   -a             show all eigenstates\n", argv[0]);
00038     exit(-1);

00047 
00048   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "a")) != -1)
00049     switch (c) {
00050     case 'a':
00051       all=1;
00052       break;

00055   char* mcstatefilefin = argv[optind];

00058

00066   readMulticonfigfile(mcstatefileini, &mbfileini, &P, &Qini, &Sini, &Eini, &nini);
00067   readMulticonfigfile(mcstatefilefin, &mbfilefin, &P, &Qfin, &Sfin, &Efin, &nfin);
00068 
00069   int direction;
00070   if (Qfin[0].Z - Qini[0].Z == 1) {
00071     fprintf(stderr, "GT+ transitions");
00072     direction = +1;
00073   }
00074   if (Qfin[0].Z - Qini[0].Z == -1) {
00075     fprintf(stderr, "GT- transitions");
00076     direction = -1;
00077   }
00078 
00079  
00080   ManyBodyOperator OpGT;
00081 
00082   if (direction == +1)
00083     OpGT = OpGTplus;
00084   if (direction == -1)
00085     OpGT = OpGTminus;
00086 
00087 
00088   int a,b; 
00089 
00090   void** gtme[nfin*nini];
00091 
00092   for (b=0; b<nini; b++)        
00093     for (a=0; a<nfin; a++)
00094       gtme[a+b*nfin] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpGT);
00095 
00096 
00097   // read or calculate matrix elements
00098   for (b=0; b<nini; b++)
00099     for (a=0; a<nfin; a++)

00101                                     &OpGT, Sfin[a], Sini[b], gtme[a+b*nfin])) {
00102         calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpGT, &Qfin[a], &Qini[b], Sfin[a], Sini[b],
00103                           gtme[a+b*nfin]);
00104         writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfilefin[a], mbfileini[b], &P,
00105                                  &OpGT, Sfin[a], Sini[b], gtme[a+b*nfin]);
00106       } 
00107   
00108   fprintf(stderr, "calculate transition strengths\n");
00109 
00110   void**** gttrans = initprojectedtransitionVector(&P, &OpGT, nfin, nini);
00111   calctransitionprojectedMBME(&P, &OpGT, gtme, Sfin, Sini, &Efin, &Eini, gttrans);
00112 
00113   // output
00114 
00115   char outfile[511];

00118 
00119   snprintf(tostrip, 255, ".states");

00121            stripstr(mcstatefilefin, tostrip), stripstr(mcstatefileini, tostrip));
00122   if (!(outfp = fopen(outfile, "w"))) {
00123     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfile);
00124     goto cleanup;

00129

00132   else
